attributes.action: Review of the increased security procedures at Airports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No liquid more than 100ml (Toothpaste, Shower Gel and Hair Gel) Although, you pass through security and purchase any product in the departure lounge at increased prices.

Understanding security will only ever get tighter. But not allowing Flight Deck/Cabin crew to carry a bottle of water to work is over the top.

Procedures are in place at the moment without any common sense or praticality.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
